welcomeText: Explore our curated resources to support your mental and physical wellness journey. Learn, practice, and grow with guidance from experts and research-backed articles.

articles.title: 5 Ways Art Therapy Improves Mental Health
articles.description: Discover how expressing yourself through painting, drawing, or creative art can reduce stress, improve mood, and help process emotions effectively.

articles.title: Beginner’s Guide to Meditation
articles.description: Learn simple meditation techniques to calm your mind, improve focus, and manage daily anxiety in just 10 minutes a day.

articles.title: The Science of Mind-Body Connection
articles.description: Understand how your mental state affects your physical health and how yoga, exercise, and mindfulness create holistic wellbeing.

articles.title: How Group Therapy Builds Confidence
articles.description: See how sharing and listening in group therapy creates belongingness, reduces isolation, and improves self-esteem.

articles.title: Tips to Reduce Exam Stress Naturally
articles.description: Easy lifestyle changes, breathing techniques, and mindset shifts to manage academic stress without feeling overwhelmed.

infographics.title: Mind-Body Connection Diagram
infographics.description: Visual representation showing how stress impacts your immune system, sleep, and digestion, and how mental health care reverses these effects.

infographics.title: Daily 5-Minute Meditation Flow
infographics.description: Step-wise graphic to practise anywhere, anytime for instant calmness.

infographics.title: Self-Care Wheel
infographics.description: Infographic highlighting emotional, physical, social, and spiritual self-care activities to maintain balance.

wellnessTips: Drink enough water daily for mental clarity.
Take short walks between study sessions to refresh your mind.
Practise deep breathing before sleep to improve rest quality.
Journal your thoughts to release mental clutter.
Connect with friends or family when feeling low.
closingNote: Remember, small daily steps create big lifelong changes. Take care of your mind and body – they are your forever home.
